Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The Stalker Company has proven a massive threat to the federation.

Destroy Stalker Company {@LinkCreature:32#7#reapers}, {@LinkCreature:32#8#destroyers}, {@LinkCreature:32#9#snipers}, and {@LinkCreature:32#12#templars}.

Report to Celion when mission is complete.
You’ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven’t completed your mission yet.
